sampleCourse.title: Money Mission: Build Your Own Business!
sampleCourse.description: Learn about money, business, and finance through fun games and activities.

sampleUnit.title: 📦 Unit 1: Start Your Lemonade Stand!
sampleUnit.description: Learn the basics of starting a business with a lemonade stand.

sampleLesson.title: 🎯 Lesson 1: What Do You Need to Start?
sampleLesson.description: Discover what items you need to start your lemonade business.

sampleLevels.title: 🧩 Level 1: Choose What You Need
sampleLevels.description: Select the right items to start your lemonade stand.

sampleLevels.title: 💰 Level 2: How Much Does It Cost?
sampleLevels.description: Estimate the costs of your lemonade stand items.

sampleLevels.title: 💸 Level 3: Where Will the Money Come From?
sampleLevels.description: Learn about different ways to fund your business.

sampleLevels.title: 📝 Level 4: What We Learned
sampleLevels.description: Review and recap everything you learned about starting your lemonade stand.

fundingSources.name: Weekly Allowance
fundingSources.description: Money you get from parents each week

fundingSources.name: Personal Savings
fundingSources.description: Money you've saved up over time
